start.name: System
start.text: The door to the crypt is extremely elaborate, with artistic swirls of bronze and silver that seem to converge upon an :CYAN:Octagonal Slot:CYAN: set in the center.

open.name: System
open.text: The :YELLOW:Vaelthorne Seal:YELLOW: is a perfect fit to the door. With a hiss, the door trembles open.
